Ravenchief and Guardia walked down a long passageway and found the
exit.  J=
udging from the light outside it was probably late evening. 
They stepped o=
utside and a cool breeze blew.  Guardia held up a signal
tracking device an=
d attempted to find where the pod was.

Ravenchief began to do meaningless =
stretches that were probably the
result of his sometimes overabundant energ=
y.

OOC: Airly my characters are looking for your pod.... I hope someone
el=
se didn't get to it first!  ^_^

On 7/20/05, rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> =
wrote:
> The group pulled the door open, immediately illuminating the room.=

> Instead of finding a door to the outside, they found a command center.
>=
 
> "So we've been inside our comand center this whole time." said Perseus.=

> 
> He looked over to the communications pannel, there was a message
> fl=
ashing on the console.  A pod was emitting a signal.  He looked at
> the ot=
her bots he had been trapped with in that room.  It had only
> been his cre=
w.
> 
> "Any for what reason did you decide not to talk to me?  Is this som=
e
> kind of joke?" asked Perseus.
> 
> "No, we didn't know where we were ei=
ther..."
> 
> "You didn' t recognize my voice?"
> 
> They now looked embarr=
assed.  Their names were Guardia, Ravenchief,
> and Salveo.  Together with =
Perseus, they were the Pasificus Maximals.
> They lived on the island of At=
lantis, and hoped to stay out of combat;
> however, they made sure to keep =
their fighting skills sharp so that
> they would not be defenceless.  They =
vowed not to use force unless
> they were defending themselves or a defence=
less person.
> 
> "I don't know what's going on, but Ravenchief and Guardia=
: you go and
> find out where this pod is.  Salveo and I will try to find o=
ut why the
> lights and doors are not functioning."
> 
> They nodded in app=
roval and left to their assigned tasks.
>
